response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, it's valued at $15,000 to us. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, we're offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to maximize the product's worth. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 12000}
